display_long_description:
# Fight for Your Life in a Dark Dimension
Experience a revolutionary form of Mixed Reality! UNDERLIE uses a 3D scan of your room—or MULTIPLE ROOMS on a floor of your home—to transform your world into a sinister parallel dimension.
                                              
[media]
# Blur the Line Between Realities
UNDERLIE uses advanced techniques based specifically on the tech of the Meta Quest 3. It uses the Quest 3's geometric room scan tech to build a fully-textured mesh in the shape of your room(s). It also takes advantage of the Quest 3's real-time "dynamic occlusion" to further blend the real and virtual worlds.

# Beyond Roomscale
Play in a single room--or transform an entire floor of your home! UNDERLIE can now combine multiple room scans to generate an even larger play area. (Rooms should be on the same level, no playing across multiple stories.)

A doorway along the outer boundary of your play area can let the game add "rooms" that you can see into BEYOND your physical play area.

# Future Development
To many people, a VR game that generates it's world based on the shape of your home would be considered the ultimate VR experience. The future scope of this game may partly depend on the audience it finds--thank you to everyone who's excited about the potential here!
